data.title: Complete List of Famous Divorces in History
data.meta_description: Discover the most famous divorces in history and learn how Galbraith Family Law can help you navigate your own divorce. You are not alone in this journey.
data.text:
When you become separated or divorced, it sometimes feels like you are alone. The truth is that approximately 50% of first marriages end in divorce and an even higher percentage of subsequent marriages in divorce. You are not alone. Millions of people have been divorced. You are not a bad person and neither is your ex-spouse.

The following is a partial list taken from www.Biography.com of famous divorced people. They come from all walks of life, from actors to politicians to athletes to business owners. So when you are feeling alone, remember the millions of others who have also gone through a divorce and take heart. If they can thrive after divorce, so can you.

Check out the website www.Biography.com for updates and full biographies.

Lisa Marie Presley (1968-) Daughter of Elvis Presley, the “King of Rock ‘n’ Roll.
